DataElement.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Newly Diagnosed And Negation Therapeutic Procedure Received Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to questions which are necessary to allow clinical study participation, as outlined in the study protocol, to address disease that is newly diagnosed and has not been treated.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Newly Diagnosed And Negation Therapeutic Procedure Receive Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._Very recently determined._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._To take, accept, or get something offered._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredName: Newly Diagnosed And Negation Therapeutic Procedure Receive Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Very recently determined.:An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.:An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:To take, accept, or get something offered.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
To take, accept, or get something offered.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does the patient have a newly
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a newly diagnosed colon or rectal cancer (initial diagnosis, either a biopsy or curative surgery, whichever is most recent) within 60 days of registration and has not yet received radiation or chemotherapy?

DataElement.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
